name: Verify Admin can remove Manager from organization
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can remove `Manager` from organization.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can remove Manager from organization.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can remove `Manager` from organization.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can remove Manager from organization.
